fields.name: Alignment:
fields.value:
Neutral Killing
Attack: Basic (Variable)
Defense: Basic (Variable)

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack a player each night. After using this ability once, you may only attack anyone within two houses of last person you targeted, ignoring dead folks.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- After attacking your first target, a random person besides you is given the `Apple`, granting them Basic defense. They're not told they have the `Apple`, but you are. Whenever someone with the `Apple` dies, it's given to a new person besides you.
- If you kill the person with the `Apple`, your Attack and Defense are permanently raised a tier, your attack reach is increased one house further, and you're lynchproof the next morning.
- When attacking someone with the `Apple`, your attack becomes Piercing, using an attack value one higher than their defense unless it would be lower than your current Attack tier anyway.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you and collect at least three `Apple`s.
